description.en: The second generation of the Mergedge miner series is here, offering a smaller yet more powerful tool that every miner must have. Evolve your mining capabilities to the max with this advanced innovation.
description.cn: The second generation of the Mergedge miner series is here, offering a smaller yet more powerful tool that every miner must have. Evolve your mining capabilities to the max with this advanced innovation.

description.en: Opening the limited Golden Abyss line of miners, the Scarabey is legally the most beautiful miner on the market. Don't be tricked by its cuteness, this golden bug is strong.
description.cn: 开设了黃金ABYSS有限的矿工产品线，从外观上来说他是颜值最高的矿机不要被它的外表所欺骗。

description.en: Booster will increase your basic power from minigames for 3 hours.
description.cn: Booster will increase your basic power from minigames for 3 hours.
description.es: Booster will increase your basic power from minigames for 3 hours.
description.pt: Booster will increase your basic power from minigames for 3 hours.

description.en: A nice slimy pet for your collection! This miner is one of the ten selected winners of the Miners Art Contest: Underwater Adventures. Created by Luukk
description.cn: A nice slimy pet for your collection! This miner is one of the ten selected winners of the Miners Art Contest: Underwater Adventures. Created by Luukk
description.es: A nice slimy pet for your collection! This miner is one of the ten selected winners of the Miners Art Contest: Underwater Adventures. Created by Luukk
description.pt: A nice slimy pet for your collection! This miner is one of the ten selected winners of the Miners Art Contest: Underwater Adventures. Created by Luukk

description.en: All pearls are shiny, beautiful and help you get some attention from the ladies, but only this one is a real treasure. Beach Party Series Miner.
description.cn: All pearls are shiny, beautiful and help you get some attention from the ladies, but only this one is a real treasure. Beach Party Series Miner.

description.en: This is a house, come on in! This is a house that keeps riches within. This is the house nobody lives. Mine to the skies, let it be your sin, yeah, yeah… By Captain Matthew
description.cn: This is a house, come on in! This is a house that keeps riches within. This is the house nobody lives. Mine to the skies, let it be your sin, yeah, yeah… By Captain Matthew
description.es: This is a house, come on in! This is a house that keeps riches within. This is the house nobody lives. Mine to the skies, let it be your sin, yeah, yeah… By Captain Matthew
description.pt: This is a house, come on in! This is a house that keeps riches within. This is the house nobody lives. Mine to the skies, let it be your sin, yeah, yeah… By Captain Matthew

description.en: Booster will increase your basic power from minigames for 12 hours.
description.cn: Booster will increase your basic power from minigames for 12 hours.
description.es: Booster will increase your basic power from minigames for 12 hours.
description.pt: Booster will increase your basic power from minigames for 12 hours.

description.en:
You can not worry about your mining room with this one. This miner is one of the ten selected winners of the Miners Art Contest: Magic Beasts.
Created by Ravell
description.cn:
You can not worry about your mining room with this one. This miner is one of the ten selected winners of the Miners Art Contest: Magic Beasts.
Created by Ravell

description.en: Only the wealthiest can afford a silk cover on their racks. But the 5% bonus is above all the cons!
description.cn: Only the wealthiest can afford a silk cover on their racks. But the 5% bonus is above all the cons!

description.en: Old-school jackets, cursed blades, and mysterious uncles with unfinished business — this squad hunts demons and bad wallets. Stylish, deadly, and just a bit unhinged.
description.cn: Old-school jackets, cursed blades, and mysterious uncles with unfinished business — this squad hunts demons and bad wallets. Stylish, deadly, and just a bit unhinged.

description.pt: Old-school jackets, cursed blades, and mysterious uncles with unfinished business — this squad hunts demons and bad wallets. Stylish, deadly, and just a bit unhinged.

description.en: Polite on the surface, brutal underneath — this miner blends calm calculation with merciless efficiency. One moment it’s steeping in silence, the next it’s tearing through blocks like a proper blockchain barbarian.
